title: Generate vintage-style price tag sticker PNG assets

requirements.text:
Generate 3 separate vintage-style "Price Tag" sticker images as transparent-background PNGs, each isolated with no shadows or background layer outside the sticker shape. Each sticker must have a slight paper texture and a small peeled corner to look like a physical sticker.

Text requirements per sticker:
- Sticker 1: "MINT" in green
- Sticker 2: "NEAR MINT" in blue
- Sticker 3: "PLAYED" in orange

quotes: Generate a set of vintage-style 'Price Tag' stickers. One says 'MINT' in green, one says 'NEAR MINT' in blue, and one says 'PLAYED' in orange. Give them a slight paper texture and a tiny bit of 'peeling' at one corner to make them look like real physical stickers. Isolated on transparent background.

acceptanceCriteria: Three PNG files are produced, one per sticker label (MINT / NEAR MINT / PLAYED).
Each PNG has a transparent background with only the sticker artwork present (no rectangular background fill).
Each sticker has visible subtle paper texture and a small peeled-corner detail.
Sticker text matches exactly and uses the specified text color (green/blue/orange), while maintaining a cohesive vintage price-tag style across all three.

requirements.text: Add the generated sticker PNGs to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure they can be loaded directly by the browser via /assets/generated/<filename>.
acceptanceCriteria: The three generated PNGs exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Requesting each asset at /assets/generated/<filename> returns the image successfully in the deployed app.

constraints: Do not add a non-transparent background; stickers must be isolated on a transparent background.
Keep all user-facing text in English (MINT, NEAR MINT, PLAYED).
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister logic.
Do not modify the existing sticker sprite-sheet system unless explicitly requested.

required: Vintage price tag sticker with paper texture and small peeled corner, text "MINT" (price-tag-mint.dim_512x512.png)
Vintage price tag sticker with paper texture and small peeled corner, text "NEAR MINT" (price-tag-near-mint.dim_512x512.png)
Vintage price tag sticker with paper texture and small peeled corner, text "PLAYED" (price-tag-played.dim_512x512.png)
